Headline: #151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan & 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Belmont, Addison & Halsted; SB Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Belmont, Addison and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are available between LaSalle and Racine to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
